summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Atoning Yoga Releasing Control
Review Date: 2017/02/08
Store: Sarah Sutton  (Actor, Artist)    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Exercise & Fitness
Product Description: ['A total of 90 minutes in length, Atoning Yoga DVDs are designed to fit your busy schedule and give you a still, calming, meditative experience with God. Offering 15 min, 30 min, and 45 min sessions, every class is inspired by a verse, opens and closes in prayer, and includes an on-going prayer that you can actively apply to your life. The Releasing Control series will walk you through how to let go of your anxiety and control issues so you can find the peace that passes all understanding through freedom in a personal relationship with Christ.', "When sold by Amazon.com, this product will be manufactured on demand using DVD-R recordable media. Amazon.com's standard return policy will apply."]
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Exercise & Fitness', 'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Stephen Henderson, Sarah Sutton', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 2.93 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 27, 2013', 'Actors': 'Sarah Sutton', 'Producers': 'Stephen Henderson', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: If you do yoga at all, this is very boring. You are seated the whole time and it is extremely slow paced. They music is nice and the prayer is nice. This could be nice if you were looking for a bed time routine

Product Description: ["One of the biggest box office hits of all time, Independence Day delivers the ultimate encounter when mysterious and powerful aliens launch an all out invasion against the human race. The spectacle begins when massive spaceships appear in Earth's skies. But wonder turns to terror as the ships blast destructive beams of fire down on cities all over the planet. Now the world's only hope lies with a determined band of survivors, uniting for one last strike against the invaders -- before it's the end of mankind."]

['A total of 90 minutes in length, Atoning Yoga DVDs are designed to fit your busy schedule and give you a still, calming, meditative experience with God. Offering 15 min, 30 min, and 45 min sessions, every class is inspired by a verse, opens and closes in prayer, and includes an on-going prayer that you can actively apply to your life. The Releasing Control series will walk you through how to let go of your anxiety and control issues so you can find the peace that passes all understanding through freedom in a personal relationship with Christ.', "When sold by Amazon.com, this product will be manufactured on demand using DVD-R recordable media. Amazon.com's standard return policy will apply."]

target_interaction.title: Love
target_interaction.text: My daughter is obsessed with sarah and duck! Sweet, simple, perfect for little kids
description: Meet Sarah, seven years old, with big eyes and a green hat who lives with her quacky, flappy best friend, Duck. Together they embark on simple but exciting adventures - trying to reach a rainbow, pretending to be a penguin or helping an umbrella to stay dry! Every step of the way they are guided by The Narrator who offers helpful suggestions and makes sure they don't go too far.
